name: @tonkeeper/core
author: Nikita Kuznetsov <nkuz915@gmail.com>
description: Core features and state for tonkeeper web wallet

scripts.generate:sdkV1: rm -fr src/tonApiV1 && docker build -f resource/Dockerfile.apiV1 . -t tonapisdkv1 && docker run --rm --user=$(id -u):$(id -g) -v "$PWD":/local tonapisdkv1
scripts.generate:sdkV2: rm -fr src/tonApiV2 && docker build -f resource/Dockerfile.apiV2 . -t tonapisdkv2 && docker run --rm --user=$(id -u):$(id -g) -v "$PWD":/local tonapisdkv2
scripts.generate:tronApi: rm -fr src/tronApi && docker build -f resource/Dockerfile.tronApi . -t tronapisdk && docker run --rm --user=$(id -u):$(id -g) -v "$PWD":/local tronapisdk
